main event: Observer watched a coppery colored object with two red lights on top and one white light underneath in Takoma Park, Maryland.
interesting points: The object came on suddenly from the east and disappeared to the south., The two bright red lights appeared to have a slight pulsating or flickering movement., The object appeared to have a slight exhaust trail., The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes and 50 seconds., The object was described as a large white disc with two red lights at each end.
sighted object: coppery colored object with two red lights and one white light
witness description: Male, 44 years old, reported observing the object while standing in his backyard.
